This specification defines APIs to control the CD player.

Summary of Methods

InterfaceMethod
CDObject
CD void setPowered(boolean state, SuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void isActivated(ActivatedSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void play(long trackNum, SuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void pause(SuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void stop(SuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void eject(SuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void getTrackNumber(TrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void getTotalTrackNumber(TotalTrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void getPlayedTime(PlayedTimeSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void getPlayingTime(PlayingTimeSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
void getTotalPlayingTime(TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback successCallback, ErrorCallback errorCallback)
ActivatedSuccessCallback void onsuccess(boolean state)
TrackNumberSuccessCallback void onsuccess(long trackNumber)
TotalTrackNumberSuccessCallback void onsuccess(long totalTrackNumber)
PlayedTimeSuccessCallback void onsuccess(long playedTime)
PlayingTimeSuccessCallback void onsuccess(long playingTime)
TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback void onsuccess(long totalPlayingTime)

Introduction

This API provides functionalities to control the CD player.

Interfaces

CDObject

There will be a motor.cd object that allows accessing the functionality of the cd module.
readonly attribute CD cd

CD

CD interface.
void setPowered(boolean state, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Turns the CD player on or off.
Signature
void setPowered(boolean state, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
boolean state
True to power on the CD player, false to power it off.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						
						motor.cd.setPowered(true, function() {
							console.log("The CD player powered on success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to power on the CD player: " + e.message);
						});
void isActivated(ActivatedSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Indicates whether the CD player is activated.
Signature
void isActivated(ActivatedSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
ActivatedSuccessCallback successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						
						motor.cd.isActivated(function(state) {
							console.log("The CD player is activated : " + state);
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Error : " + e.message);
						});
void play(long trackNum, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Begins or resumes playing the currently opened track, if any.
Signature
void play(long trackNum, optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
long trackNum
The track number.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						motor.cd.play(1, function() {
							console.log("Playing success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to play the track: " + e.message);
						});
void pause(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback errorCallback)
Pauses playback of the current track. Playback may be resumed with play().
Signature
void pause(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						motor.cd.pause(function() {
							console.log("Pausing success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to pause the track: " + e.message);
						});
void stop(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback errorCallback)
Stops playback of the current track. If play() is called, playback will start from the beginning.
Signature
void stop(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						motor.cd.stop(function() {
							console.log("Stopping success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to stop the track: " + e.message);
						});
void eject(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Ejects a CD from the CD player.
Signature
void eject(optional SuccessCallback? successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
optional SuccessCallback? successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						
						motor.cd.eject(function() {
							console.log("Ejecting success.");
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to eject the track: " + e.message);
						});
void getTrackNumber(TrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Gets the current track number.
Signature
void getTrackNumber(TrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
TrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
						motor.cd.getTrackNumber(function(trackNum) {
							console.log(The current track number: " + trackNum);
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to get the current track number: " + e.message);
						});
void getTotalTrackNumber(TotalTrackNumberSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)

						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to get the total number of tracks: " + e.message);
						});

							console.log(The played time of the current track: " + playedTime);
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to get the played time of the current track: " + e.message);
						});

void getTotalPlayingTime(TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Gets the total playing time of all tracks.
Signature
void getTotalPlayingTime(TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback successCallback, optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback)
Return value
none.
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR if the input parameter is not compatible with the expected type for that parameter.
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback successCallback
The method to be invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
optional ErrorCallback? errorCallback
The method to be invoked when an error occurs.
	
						motor.cd.getTotalPlayingTime(function(totalPlayingTime) {
							console.log(The total playing time of all tracks: " + totalPlayingTime);
						},
						function(e) {
							console.log("Failed to get the total playing time of all tracks: " + e.message);
						});

ActivatedSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.isActivated().
void onsuccess(boolean state)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(boolean state)
boolean state
True if the CD player is activated, false otherwise.

TrackNumberSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.getTrackNumber().
void onsuccess(long trackNumber)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(long trackNumber)
long trackNumber
The current track number.

TotalTrackNumberSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.getTotalTrackNumber().
void onsuccess(long totalTrackNumber)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(long totalTrackNumber)
long totalTrackNumber
The total number of tracks.

PlayedTimeSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.getPlayedTime().
void onsuccess(long playedTime)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(long playedTime)
long playedTime
The played time of the current track, which unit is second.

PlayingTimeSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.getPlayingTime().
void onsuccess(long playingTime)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(long playingTime)
long playingTime
The total playing time of the current track, which unit is second.

TotalPlayingTimeSuccessCallback

The success callback for CD.getTotalPlayingTime().
void onsuccess(long totalPlayingTime)
The method invoked when the asynchronous call completes successfully.
Signature
void onsuccess(long totalPlayingTime)
long totalPlayingTime
The total playing time of all tracks, which unit is second.

Features

When the feature
  • http://obigo.com/api/cd
or any of the features hierarchically under that feature is successfully requested, the interface CD is instantiated, and the resulting object appears in the global namespace as motor.cd.
This is the list of URIs used to declare this API's features, for use in the widget config.xml. For each URL, the list of functions covered is provided.

http://obigo.com/api/cd
Access to all the features in this module.
